QuestData.Title: To Arms!
QuestData.Description: As we struggled not to drown, my men and I were forced to abandon our weapons and much of our armor.$b$bErunak says to expect a major attack from the naga soon and I'm inclined to believe him.$b$bIf we're going to stand a chance, we'll need your help to recover our lost armaments. They should be lying on the sea floor near our shipwrecks.$b$bHurry, $r, we're defenseless here.
QuestData.LogDescription: Gather 4 Stormwind Spears, 4 Stormwind Breastplates, 4 Stormwind Shields and 4 Stormwind Helms.$b$bThe equipment may also be collected from Gliblin Scavengers.
QuestData.RewardText: Well done, $c!$b$bThanks to you, my men will be ready to confront the enemy when they attack.
